root.name: Caesars Palace 2000
root.description: Caesar's Palace 2000: Millenium Gold Edition is a casino game released on Windows PCs, the Playstation 1, and the Sega Dreamcast.According to information given in the game, the odds of winning are scientifically accurate, though whether there was any scientific research used to reach this conclusion remains to be seen. According to information displayed on the box, the research was verified by one William Bertram, who apparently has a PHD.Caesar's Palace 2000 was a tie-in game from the casino in order to celebrate the millenium, and features tutorials in order to help novices get better at different casino games before entering the real content of the game. Caesar's Palace 2000 was developed by Runecraft, and was published by Interplay.ReceptionMillenium Gold Edition, as it was also known (as a suffix to the original title) received abysmal reviews from critics, and most reviews barely average 25/100. The lowest review appears to be from the German publication PC Player, who rated it as 22/100.
